title: Dingir:SCP-076
content:
[[module CSS]]

@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Libre+Baskerville&family=Noto+Serif+JP&display=swap');

body {
    font-family: 'Libre Baskerville', 'Noto Serif JP', serif;
}

[[/module]]

[[include :scp-wiki-cn:credit:start-standalone]]
**标题:** dingir[[footnote]] **译注：**dingir是加在吉尔伽美什史诗中给吉尔伽美什、恩奇都等人名字前的尊称，意即“神明” [[/footnote]]
**作图:** ©︎[[*user hitsujikaip]]
**年份:** 2020

**底本:** [http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-076 SCP-076]
**原作:** ©︎[[*user Kain Pathos Crow]]
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:credit:end-standalone]]

[[=]]
++ 亚伯
[[/=]]

------

cul me,,3,,^^!^^-ka cul /me,,3,,\-ka en-du-ni ga-an-dug,,4,,
en ^^d^^gilgamec,,2,, cul me,,3,,-ka en-du-ni ga-an-dug,,4,,
a,,2,,-/ur,,2,, sag,,9,,\-sag,,9,, cul me,,3,,-/ka\ en-du-ni ga-an-dug,,4,,
en TUR /kalag\-kalag-ga cul me,,3,,-ka en-/du\-ni ga-an-dug,,4,,

[[>]]
//吉尔伽美什史诗//[[footnote]]
**长歌乎，献与猛士也！
长歌乎，吉尔伽美什，颂我君子，猛士也！
长歌乎，四体美亦匀，猛士也！
长歌乎，其人强亦盛......主也，猛士也！**
[[>]]
//汉语翻译：[[*user Etinjat]]//
[[/>]]

引用自[http://etcsl.orinst.ox.ac.uk/cgi-bin/etcsl.cgi?text=c.1.8.1.2&display=Crit&charenc=&lineid=c1812.1.A.1 The Erectronic Text Corpus of Sumerian Literature]

牛津大学 东方研究院
于 2016-11-30 由 RC 更新

[[/footnote]]
[[/>]]
